alert.note: Alert for Maui Central Valley South; Maui Windward West; Molokai Leeward South; Molokai Southeast (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued August 29 at 3:45AM HST until August 30 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...MINOR COASTAL FLOODING DURING AFTERNOON HIGH TIDES THROUGH WEDNESDAY... ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Isolated minor coastal flooding. * WHERE...Vulnerable low-lying coastal roadways, docks, boat ramps, marina parking lots, and other coastal infrastructure for all Hawaiian Islands. * WHEN...Afternoon hours during the daily peak tides through Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of beaches that are normally dry, minor coastal erosion, and saltwater inundation.
info.instruction: Avoid driving through flooded roadways. If you are forced to drive through salt water, be sure to rinse your vehicle with fresh water. Move electronics, vehicles or other valuables to higher ground. Monitor vessels to ensure mooring lines don`t get too tight and watchout for overwash around boat ramps. Secure canoes or other watercraft stowed on beaches.

area.areaDesc: Maui Central Valley South; Maui Windward West; Molokai Leeward South; Molokai Southeast
